name: Resurrection: The Return of the Black Dragon
name_original: Resurrection: The Return of the Black Dragon
description:
Resurrection: The Return of the Black Dragon is an action-shooter game developed by Nebula Entertainment. It was originally released in 2001. It was published by Dinamic Multimedia. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Resurrection: The Return of the Black Dragon on PC.
